snippet: Latoya Ford is studying to become an emergency medical technician, but she will lose her room at Covenant House, a shelter for homeless young people, early next year.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York secures a grant for Latoya Ford, living in a Manhattan shelter, so she can pursue her studies to become an emergency medical technician.
lead_paragraph: Latoya Ford is studying to become an emergency medical technician, but she will lose her room at Covenant House, a shelter for homeless young people, early next year.

headline.seo: Working Hard, Studying and Still Seeking a Home
